entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
